QuestData.Title: The Right Parts for the Job
QuestData.Description: Uncle Krixel's a tough one but he won't be going anywhere on foot with his leg broken.$b$bHe has a flying machine he brought from Azeroth that can fly us out of here. Problem is, the engine's busted.$b$bI'll need some parts to fix the thing. My car's wasted but those broken shredders just outside of town should have what we need. We don't have time to break them down by hand so just use this rocket launcher and blow 'em apart. Anything that survives the blast should be strong enough to use on the engine.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the G-14 Buster Rocket near Broken Shredders to retrieve Serviceable Gears.
QuestData.RewardText: Great work $n!$b$bGive me some time and I'll have this thing ready to roll out!
